name: Fit Beats!
description:
🎵 Fit Beats 🎵

"Are you tired of sitting around lazily on your desk? Have you been skipping leg day? Fear not! We got you covered! "

Fit Beats is a rhythm game where you hit the beats in order to get fit! The game is designed as a game jam submission for Red River College with the theme of Crunch!

Features

One track/level with easy difficulty
One key (spacebar) for hitting beats
Offset Setter (to accurately play on different computers)
Score system with high score integration
Original 3D and 2D art
AI generated music

 ♣️ Three Of Clubs ♣️ Meet The Team

We are a dedicated group of students who are passionate in making fun games that everyone can enjoy.
